column5: just wondering if anyone knows if/how i can watch my itunes movies on my samsung smart tv...  can i connect my iphone with movies on it through the usb port on my tv and watch itunes movies...?  im just looking to get the most out of the technology i have...  thanx  mike

Don't know if that will work or not. Might have to copy to a USB stick and play from there.  I can play from an external hard drive connected to my tv but usually I just plug a usb stick into my surround sound receiver and play from there.
But how do you get it from iTunes to a format on a USB that will play on the tv?

Got to your iTunes folder on your computer and copy/paste the file to a usb stick. If it is in a format your tv doesn't have a codec for just use a converter like AVC to convert it to one it can play like MPEG, WMI, AVI.  iTunes data is located in the iTunes folder in your music folder/library.
Just buy the iPhone to HD or RCA cable , watch anything from the iPhone on your TV ... 35$ at Wal Mart
There's the easy low tech solution I was looking for....  Thanks randy...
Posted the pic on your Facebook ... Saves me from bringing a DVD player and movies while out in te Camper
